duties_responsibilities.duty: Plan, coordinate, budget, and supervise construction projects and/or project packages.
Prepare cost estimates, budgets, and work timetables.
Interpret and explain contracts, requirements and technical information to other professionals.
Collaborate with architects, engineers, designers and other construction specialists.
Monitor projects and report progress and budget.
Respond to work delays, emergencies, and other problems with the project.
Ensure that the project complies with legal requirements, such building and safety codes.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Construction Management, Engineering, or a related field (Master's preferred)
